description: Aspirin is used to reduce fever, pain, and inflammation. It is also used to reduce the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Metoprolol is used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and arrhythmias.
Diazepam is used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal, and seizures.
Dexamethasone is a corticosteroid used to treat inflammation, severe allergies, and conditions like arthritis.
Lisinopril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and kidney disease.
Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever, pain, and inflammation.
Paracetamol is used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.
Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections, including urinary tract infections.
Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor used to treat acid reflux, stomach ulcers, and other digestive issues.
Azithromycin is an antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections including respiratory and skin infections.
Codeine is a narcotic used to treat mild to moderate pain and cough.
Methotrexate is used to treat certain cancers and autoimmune diseases, including rheumatoid arthritis.
Tamoxifen is used to treat and prevent breast cancer.
Levodopa is used to treat Parkinson's disease and other neurological conditions.
Hydrocodone is a pain reliever used to treat severe pain, often in post-surgery situations.
Prednisolone is a corticosteroid used to treat inflammation and conditions like arthritis.
Gabapentin is used to treat seizures, nerve pain, and restless leg syndrome.
Amlodipine is used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
Losartan is used to treat high blood pressure and to protect the kidneys in diabetic patients.
Methylprednisolone is used to treat inflammation, severe allergies, and conditions like arthritis.
Ceftriaxone is a broad-spectrum antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
Clindamycin is used to treat serious bacterial infections, including bone infections.
Doxorubicin is a chemotherapy drug used to treat a variety of cancers.
Atorvastatin is used to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.
Hydroxychloroquine is used to treat autoimmune diseases like lupus and rheumatoid arthritis.
Furosemide is a diuretic used to reduce fluid retention and treat high blood pressure.
